Prev: Port steps Up: Miscellaneous Next: Hotel Barcelona

Human statue



...in front of the cathedral. Her dress is made out of old newspapers. There were many more human statues along the Rambla -- if you gave them some money, they would come to life for a minute or two.
Taken Sunday, September 09, 2001, 06:04:00pm.  Original image size: 1200x1600, 980kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/320s @ F7.0, ISO 100, 377mm
